critique: The document is a formal recommendation from the Secretary of the Interior to the President regarding land allocation for the Santee Sioux Indians. The tone is formal and bureaucratic. There is a slight sense of advocacy for the Santee Sioux Indians, but it is very mild. Therefore, I will assign low scores across all emotions. Initial scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 2, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1. Revised scores: Joy: 1, Sadness: 2, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 1
